item.title: Edmund Husserl: What are We Able to Study Rigorously?
item.description: There is a powerful irony in our project. It is an attempt to formally study that which has historically eluded formal study.

item.title: The Eidos: Forms and Essences

item.title: The Question of the Emergence of Ontologies
item.description: The question that began this journey into complex systems science is a bit of strange one. When I am looking at a glass on a table, there is some light that refracts off of it that just so happen to be absorbed by my eye and turned into neuronal impulses.
